docs.snippet: LeBron James learned from his experience signing with the Heat to focus on the present. Carmelo Anthony, by contrast, has taken the opposite approach, saying he wants to be a free agent....
docs.lead_paragraph: LeBron James learned from his experience signing with the Heat to focus on the present. Carmelo Anthony, by contrast, has taken the opposite approach, saying he wants to be a free agent.
docs.abstract: Harvey Araton on Pro Basketball column observes that Miami Heat forward LeBron James has learned from his experience with contract negotiations to focus on the present; holds that New York Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony would do well to think twice, based on his own contractual fights, to think twice about injecting the cloud of uncertainty into yet another season by announcing he wants to become a free agent.

headline.main: Knicks and Heat Offer a Contrast in Franchises and Stars

docs.snippet: With the owner Mikhail D. Prokhorov watching the Nets’ home opener in November, they beat the Heat. But changes have occurred leading to their game against the Hawks next week at O2 Arena....
docs.lead_paragraph: With the owner Mikhail D. Prokhorov watching the Nets’ home opener in November, they beat the Heat. But changes have occurred leading to their game against the Hawks next week at O2 Arena.
docs.abstract: Mikhail D Prokhorov, owner of Brooklyn Nets, is planning to attend team’s game against the Atlanta Hawks in London; it will be the first time he has attended a Nets game since Nov 1, when he watched team win its home opener, a misleading prelude given how the season has played out.

headline.main: Prokhorov Will See Different Nets Team in London Than in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Prokhorov Will See Different Nets Team in London Than in Brooklyn

docs.snippet: With Smith benched after being fined by the league for “unsportsmanlike conduct,” the Knicks surged to their fourth victory in five games by beating the two-time defending champions....
docs.lead_paragraph: With Smith benched after being fined by the league for “unsportsmanlike conduct,” the Knicks surged to their fourth victory in five games by beating the two-time defending champions.
docs.abstract: New York Knicks defeat Miami Heat, 102-92; Carmelo Anthony leads Knicks with 29 points and 8 rebounds.

headline.main: Knicks Stun J. R. Smith and Then the Heat
headline.print_headline: Knicks Stun Smith and Then the Heat

docs.snippet: Although contrite for suggesting that an American sentenced to 15 years of hard labor by North Korea may have deserved his fate, Rodman continued his whirlwind tour of the country....
docs.lead_paragraph: Although contrite for suggesting that an American sentenced to 15 years of hard labor by North Korea may have deserved his fate, Rodman continued his whirlwind tour of the country.
docs.abstract: Dennis Rodman apologizes for comments suggesting that American missionary Kenneth Bae, jailed in North Korea, deserves his fate, saying he he had been drinking at the time; Rodman has come under sharp criticism for positive statements he has made about leader Kim Jong-un during a visit to North Korea, leading a group of retired NBA players in an exhibition game in Pyongyan.

headline.main: Dennis Rodman Regrets Comments on North Korea Prisoner

docs.snippet: Partypoker’s arrangement with the Devils and the 76ers, who are owned by the same group, includes co-branded features that integrate Partypoker into the teams’ websites and mobile applications....
docs.lead_paragraph: Partypoker’s arrangement with the Devils and the 76ers, who are owned by the same group, includes co-branded features that integrate Partypoker into the teams’ websites and mobile applications.
docs.abstract: Hockey's New Jersey Devils and baseball's Philadelphia 76ers, who are owned by same group, become first American major professional sports teams to join up with an online gambling company; teams make multiyear deal worth a reported $10 million with partypoker.com, a site that enables players in New Jersey to wager money in online poker games.

headline.main: Devils and 76ers Are First in U.S. to Team With Online Gambling Firm
headline.print_headline: Devils and 76ers Are First in U.S. to Team With Online Gambling Firm

byline.contributor: Ken Belson contributed reporting from New York.

docs.snippet: No. 12 Louisville, the defending national champions, were unable to hold off No. 24 Memphis....
docs.lead_paragraph: No. 12 Louisville, the defending national champions, were unable to hold off No. 24 Memphis.
docs.abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Memphis upsets Louisville, 73-67; other scores, in both men's and women's college basketball, noted.

headline.main: Rally Propels Memphis to Upset of Louisville
headline.print_headline: Rally Propels Memphis To Upset of Louisville
